verses.esv:
6   For to us a child is born,
    to us a son is given;
  and the government shall be upon his shoulder,
    and his name shall be called
  Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God,
    Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.
verses.kjv: 6 For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.
verses.niv: 6 For to us a child is born, to us a son is given, and the government will be on his shoulders. And he will be called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.

verses.esv:
23   “Behold, the virgin shall conceive and bear a son,
    and they shall call his name Immanuel”

(which means, God with us).
verses.kjv: 23 Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.
verses.niv: 23 "The virgin will be with child and will give birth to a son, and they will call him Immanuel"--which means, "God with us."

verses.esv: 13 I am the Alpha and the Omega, the first and the last, the beginning and the end.”
verses.kjv: 13 I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end, the first and the last.
verses.niv: 13 I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.

verses.esv: 58 Jesus said to them, “Truly, truly, I say to you, before Abraham was, I am.”
verses.kjv: 58 Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Before Abraham was, I am.
verses.niv: 58 "I tell you the truth," Jesus answered, "before Abraham was born, I am!"

verses.esv: 12 Again Jesus spoke to them, saying, “I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.”
verses.kjv: 12 Then spake Jesus again unto them, saying, I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.
verses.niv: 12 When Jesus spoke again to the people, he said, "I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will never walk in darkness, but will have the light of life."

verses.esv: 1:1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.kjv: 1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
verses.niv: 1 In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

verses.esv: 16 On his robe and on his thigh he has a name written, King of kings and Lord of lords.
verses.kjv: 16 And he hath on his vesture and on his thigh a name written, KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.
verses.niv: 16 On his robe and on his thigh he has this name written: KING OF KINGS AND LORD OF LORDS.

verses.esv: 8 “I am the Alpha and the Omega,” says the Lord God, “who is and who was and who is to come, the Almighty.”
verses.kjv: 8 I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
verses.niv: 8 "I am the Alpha and the Omega," says the Lord God, "who is, and who was, and who is to come, the Almighty."

verses.esv: 11 I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
verses.kjv: 11 I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep.
verses.niv: 11 "I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

verses.esv: 29 The next day he saw Jesus coming toward him, and said, “Behold, the Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world!
verses.kjv: 29 The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him, and saith, Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.
verses.niv: 29 The next day John saw Jesus coming toward him and said, "Look, the Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world!

verses.esv:
2:1   I am a rose of Sharon,
    a lily of the valleys.
verses.kjv: 1 I am the rose of Sharon, and the lily of the valleys.
verses.niv: 1 I am a rose of Sharon, a lily of the valleys.

verses.esv: 6 Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
verses.kjv: 6 Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
verses.niv: 6 Jesus answered, "I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

verses.esv: 25 Jesus said to her, “I am the resurrection and the life. Whoever believes in me, though he die, yet shall he live,
verses.kjv: 25 Jesus said unto her, I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live:
verses.niv: 25 Jesus said to her, "I am the resurrection and the life. He who believes in me will live, even though he dies;

verses.esv: 2:1 My little children, I am writing these things to you so that you may not sin. But if anyone does sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous.
verses.kjv: 1 My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:
verses.niv: 1 My dear children, I write this to you so that you will not sin. But if anybody does sin, we have one who speaks to the Father in our defense--Jesus Christ, the Righteous One.

verses.esv:
69   and has raised up a horn of salvation for us
    in the house of his servant David,
verses.kjv: 69 And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David;
verses.niv: 69 He has raised up a horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David

verses.esv: 1:1 The book of the genealogy of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
verses.kjv: 1 The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
verses.niv: 1 A record of the genealogy of Jesus Christ the son of David, the son of Abraham:

verses.esv: 16 “I, Jesus, have sent my angel to testify to you about these things for the churches. I am the root and the descendant of David, the bright morning star.”
verses.kjv: 16 I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches. I am the root and the offspring of David, and the bright and morning star.
verses.niv: 16 "I, Jesus, have sent my angel to give you this testimony for the churches. I am the Root and the Offspring of David, and the bright Morning Star."

verses.esv: 13 He is clothed in a robe dipped in blood, and the name by which he is called is The Word of God.
verses.kjv: 13 And he was clothed with a vesture dipped in blood: and his name is called The Word of God.
verses.niv: 13 He is dressed in a robe dipped in blood, and his name is the Word of God.

verses.esv: 11 Then I saw heaven opened, and behold, a white horse! The one sitting on it is called Faithful and True, and in righteousness he judges and makes war.
verses.kjv: 11 And I saw heaven opened, and behold a white horse; and he that sat upon him was called Faithful and True, and in righteousness he doth judge and make war.
verses.niv: 11 I saw heaven standing open and there before me was a white horse, whose rider is called Faithful and True. With justice he judges and makes war.

verses.esv: 5 And one of the elders said to me, “Weep no more; behold, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has conquered, so that he can open the scroll and its seven seals.”
verses.kjv: 5 And one of the elders saith unto me, Weep not: behold, the Lion of the tribe of Juda, the Root of David, hath prevailed to open the book, and to loose the seven seals thereof.
verses.niv: 5 Then one of the elders said to me, "Do not weep! See, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has triumphed. He is able to open the scroll and its seven seals."

verses.esv: 14 “And to the angel of the church in Laodicea write: ‘The words of the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the beginning of God’s creation.
verses.kjv: 14 And unto the angel of the church of the Laodiceans write; These things saith the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the beginning of the creation of God;
verses.niv: 14 "To the angel of the church in Laodicea write: These are the words of the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the ruler of God's creation.

verses.esv:
5 and from Jesus Christ the faithful witness, the firstborn of the dead, and the ruler of kings on earth.

To him who loves us and has freed us from our sins by his blood
verses.kjv: 5 And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,
verses.niv: 5 before his throne, and from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, the firstborn from the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth.

verses.esv: 2 looking to Jesus, the founder and perfecter of our faith, who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is seated at the right hand of the throne of God.
verses.kjv: 2 Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God.
verses.niv: 2 Let us fix our eyes on Jesus, the author and perfecter of our faith, who for the joy set before him endured the cross, scorning its shame, and sat down at the right hand of the throne of God.

verses.esv: 3:1 Therefore, holy brothers, you who share in a heavenly calling, consider Jesus, the apostle and high priest of our confession,
verses.kjv: 1 Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;
verses.niv: 1 Therefore, holy brothers, who share in the heavenly calling, fix your thoughts on Jesus, the apostle and high priest whom we confess.

verses.esv: 5 For there is one God, and there is one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,
verses.kjv: 5 For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
verses.niv: 5 For there is one God and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,
